question: Can I increase my mortgage amount with an improved credit score of 720?
true_answer: Yes, with a credit score of 720, you can qualify for better loan terms and potentially increase your mortgage amount.

steps.content: Can I increase my mortgage amount with an improved credit score of 720?
Plan: 1) Verify new credit score with credit_agent. 2) Check new mortgage limits with home_loan_agent. 3) Calculate new DTI. 4) Supervisor review. 5) Provide final answer.
Credit score confirmed at 720, a significant improvement.
Retrieving knowledge on mortgage limits with improved credit.
With a credit score of 720, borrower may qualify for higher mortgage limits and better interest rates.
Calculating possible debt-to-income adjustments for higher mortgage.
New calculated DTI remains within acceptable limits for increased mortgage.
How does the interest rate affect my monthly payments?
Retrieving information on interest rate impact on payments.
Lower interest rates reduce monthly payments and overall interest paid.
Review complete. All criteria for mortgage increase and interest rate adjustment are satisfied.
Yes, with a credit score of 720, you can qualify for better loan terms and potentially increase your mortgage amount. Lower interest rates will also reduce your monthly payments.
